S

search(ImgDescriptor, int) - Method in class it.unipi.ing.mim.facerecognition.SearchEngine
Performs a sequential scan search on the descriptor list that represents the database in order to find the K most similar images (in terms of distance) to the specified query.
SEARCH_ENGINE_HTML - Static variable in class it.unipi.ing.mim.facerecognition.RecognitionParameters
 
SEARCH_ENGINE_HTML_FD - Static variable in class it.unipi.ing.mim.facerecognition.RecognitionParameters
 
SearchEngine - Class in it.unipi.ing.mim.facerecognition
This class provides the methods used to search similar images in the database.
SearchEngine() - Constructor for class it.unipi.ing.mim.facerecognition.SearchEngine
 
searchEngine(String, int) - Static method in class it.unipi.ing.mim.facerecognition.SearchEngine
Scan the database to find similar images to the one specified by the path.
searchEngine(opencv_core.Mat, int, String) - Static method in class it.unipi.ing.mim.facerecognition.SearchEngine
Scans the database to find similar images to the face specified as Mat.
SearchEngineFaceDetection - Class in it.unipi.ing.mim.facerecognition
This class only contains a main function used to test the SearchEngine when a face detection has first occurred.
SearchEngineFaceDetection() - Constructor for class it.unipi.ing.mim.facerecognition.SearchEngineFaceDetection
 
SearchEngineFrame - Class in it.unipi.ing.mim.gui
This class implements the graphic interface for the Search Engine functionality.

Create the application.
